5544.verse: فَمَا|Then what|91|102|132$لَهُمْ|(is) for them,|108|131|98$عَنِ|(that) from|94|117|1663$ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ|the Reminder|106|129|17573$مُعْرِضِينَ|they (are) turning away.|184|196|5417$

5564.verse: يُنَبَّؤُاْ|Will be informed|124|133|17596$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ|[the] man|90|107|3927$يَوْمَئِذِۭ|that Day|78|95|3485$بِمَا|of what|71|88|43$قَدَّمَ|he sent forth|107|124|14889$وَأَخَّرَ|and kept back.|119|128|17597$

5569.verse: فَإِذَا|And when|85|125|1730$قَرَأْنَـٰهُ|We have recited it,|148|228|17605$فَٱتَّبِعْ|then follow|93|173|17606$قُرْءَانَهُۥ|its recitation.|109|149|17607$

5543.verse: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.

5544.verse: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

5545.verse: As if they were alarmed donkeys

5547.verse: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

5548.verse: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

5549.verse: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

5550.verse: Then whoever wills will remember it.

5551.verse: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

5552.verse: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

5553.verse: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

5554.verse: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?

5555.verse: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.

5556.verse: But man desires to continue in sin.

5557.verse: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

5560.verse: And the sun and the moon are joined,

5561.verse: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"

5563.verse: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.

5564.verse: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.

5565.verse: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,

5566.verse: Even if he presents his excuses.

5567.verse: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.

5568.verse: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.

5569.verse: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.

5570.verse: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].
